# ndefReaderSessionErrorTagSizeTooSmall

**Type Property**

The NDEF tag memory size is too small to store the data.

## Declaration

```swift
static var ndefReaderSessionErrorTagSizeTooSmall: NFCReaderError.Code { get }
```

## NDEF Tag Errors

- **ndefReaderSessionErrorTagNotWritable**: The NDEF tag isn’t writable.
- **ndefReaderSessionErrorTagUpdateFailure**: The reader session failed to update the NDEF tag.
- **ndefReaderSessionErrorZeroLengthMessage**: The NDEF tag doesn’t contain an NDEF message.

items.description: The reader session failed to update the NDEF tag.
